title: Twitter reacts to Dan Hooker's dominant win over Al Iaquinta at UFC 243
text:
Gallery Dan Hooker def. Al Iaquinta at UFC 243: Best photos view 22 images

Dan Hooker earned the biggest win of his career on Saturday when he defeated Al Iaquinta in the UFC 243 co-main event.

Hooker (19-8 MMA, 9-4 UFC) improved to 6-1 since he moved up to the lightweight division when he scored a unanimous decision victory over Iaquinta (14-6-1 MMA, 9-5 UFC) in the matchup of lightweight contenders, which took place at Marvel Stadium in Melbourne, Australia, and aired on pay-per-view.

Check below for the top Twitter reactions to Hooker’s victory over Iaquinta at UFC 243.

* * * *

Al Iaquinta walking out to "Woke Up This Morning" by A3 aka the theme song from 'The Sopranos' will always be awesome#UFC243 pic.twitter.com/32zaiZ5LuG — Damon Martin (@DamonMartin) October 6, 2019

Low kick cuts Als' leg down. Hooker kicks him in the groin and Al was on a single. Ref was gonna step in. Iaquinta had to yell him off. Hooker sprawls him out and lands hard elbows. #UFC243 — Bloody Elbow (@BloodyElbow) October 6, 2019

@ufc you have to vanish low kick to knees & low leg!

To much injury for fighters !! — Ivan Menjivar MMA (@Ivanmenjivar) October 6, 2019

Hooker doing to Al with these back-mount floats what Jason Knight did to him. Impressive leaps there. #UFC243 — Dan Tom (@DanTomMMA) October 6, 2019

Damn Hooker dottin him up 1st round — Sean O'Malley (@SugaSeanMMA) October 6, 2019

Hooker looks so smooth. Phenomenal performance so far. #UFC243 — Seán Sheehan (@SeanSheehanBA) October 6, 2019

Man those low calf kicks are no joke! Round 2 #ufc243 — Stephen Thompson (@WonderboyMMA) October 6, 2019

So… as a sport… we’re just gonna keep calf kicking eh? That’s what we’re doing eh? — Andre Fili (@TouchyFili) October 6, 2019

Great opening round for Dan Hooker in the co-main event. Those low calf kicks are looking painful. — Brett Okamoto (@bokamotoESPN) October 6, 2019

Hooker is doing his thing tonight #UFC243 — Mike Jackson, Esq. (@TheTruthJackson) October 6, 2019

Dan Hooker looks unflappable. — Luke Thomas (@lthomasnews) October 6, 2019

Hooker sits Iaquinta down with a right hand! #UFC243 pic.twitter.com/HuWOxJWhhh — UFC (@ufc) October 6, 2019

Arena explodes as Hooker knocks Iaquinta down towards the end of the second #UFC243 — Peter Carroll (@PetesyCarroll) October 6, 2019

Iaquinta is unable to heel hook Hooker. #UFC243 — Marc Raimondi (@marc_raimondi) October 6, 2019

Have it 20-18 Hooker going into the third. Had it for Al until that late knockdown. — Aaron Bronsteter (@aaronbronsteter) October 6, 2019

Man, I love Serra and Longo #UFC243 — Tatiana Suarez (@tatianaufc) October 6, 2019

Iaquinta is so fucking tough. Huge finish to that round for Hooker. — caposa (@Grabaka_Hitman) October 6, 2019

Al is a tough mother fucker man that right hand was flush and he recovers goes for heel hook , leg is damaged bad and he goes south paw adjusts and lands some good stuff — Brian Kelleher (@brianboom135) October 6, 2019

Hooker is riding that wave 🌊 with the home field advantage. Looking sharp ! #UFC243 — Derek Brunson (@DerekBrunson) October 6, 2019

Tell me calf kicks haven’t changed the game — Anthony Rocco Martin (@TonyRoccoMartin) October 6, 2019

Hooker's not even breathing heavy — Tim B (@TB_Money) October 6, 2019

Great performance by Hooker. 30-27. — Nick Baldwin (@NickBaldwinMMA) October 6, 2019

I can't even imagine how much Raging Al's flight from Australia to New York is going to suck after taking a beating like that — Dave Doyle (@davedoylemma) October 6, 2019

Great performance by @danthehangman and so much respect for @IAQUINTAREALTY true warrior! — michael (@bisping) October 6, 2019

Al tough as fuck — Sean O'Malley (@SugaSeanMMA) October 6, 2019

Hooker calls out Dustin Poirier and walks off. — Aaron Bronsteter (@aaronbronsteter) October 6, 2019

Dan Hooker with the mic drop callout: "Dustin Poirier, I'm going to smash your face in. Meet me in New Zealand, 2020, and I'm going to end you!" #UFC243 — Shaheen Al-Shatti (@shaunalshatti) October 6, 2019
description: See the top Twitter reactions to Dan Hooker's victory against Al Iaquinta in the UFC 243 co-main event.
